title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.8 - Return of prisoner to jail
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.8 - Return of prisoner to jail

State Regulations
A prisoner admitted to a hospital pursuant to this Part
shall be returned to the jail when it is determined that he is no longer in
need of involuntary care and treatment, unless, subject to the approval of the
court, the prisoner voluntarily agrees to continuation of care and treatment. Such continuation of treatment on a voluntary basis shall be subject to these
regulations and to all the provisions of the Mental Hygiene Law applicable to
voluntary patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
18.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
